subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: For Ramon Galloway, Philadelphia represented circumstances he had once tried to leave behind. But he has moved back to play at La Salle, a move that has allowed him to play in front of his father, who is blind.
snippet: For Ramon Galloway, Philadelphia represented circumstances he had once tried to leave behind. But he has moved back to play at La Salle, a move that has allowed him to play in front of his father, who is blind.
